title: 2 Bedroom With A Den Ready Now!! Come Look While You Have The Chance!!
posting_body: ['Shorewood', '3209 Shorewood Drive, Mercer Island, WA, 98040', 'See our property details here:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 84', 'OR Text', '84', 'to', 'show contact info', 'for more information.', 'Quiet, Island Living', 'This is a 2 Bedroom + 1 Den, 1 Bath, approximately 958 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Located on Mercer Island just outside of Seattle, Washington you’ll find comfort and convenience in this luxury apartment community.', 'Shorewood offers restored, spacious one, two, and three bedroom apartment homes that feature hardwood floors, crown molding, washer and dryer in every home and fully equipped kitchens.', 'Residents can also enjoy our community room, 24-hour fitness center, tennis courts and basketball courts.', 'Mercer Island schools nearby and easy access to I-90 puts you in a great location where residents enjoy numerous shopping and dining venues nearby and around Seattle.', 'Lease today to experience luxury living at its best.', 'Features', '- Built-in microwaves', '- Washer/dryer', '- Fireplace*', '- Expansive walk-in closets*', '- Large picture windows', '- Spacious kitchens with charming garden windows', '- Views of Lake Washington*', '- Stainless steel appliances*', '- Luxe baths with oversized mirrors', '- Dishwasher', '- Granite Countertops*', '- Lush treehouse-style views*', '- Shaker-style white or soft grey cabinetry*', '- Balcony*', '- Neutral-toned carpeting in bedrooms*', '- Carpeted and Hardwood Floors', '*In select units', 'Community Amenities', '- Surrounded by nature', '- Billiards', '- Shuffleboard', '- Expansive sun deck', '- Grilling stations', '- Sports Pavilion Gazebo', '- Fitness-on-Demand', '- Private yoga room', '- Online Payments Available', '- Guest Suite', '- Nearby walking trails', '- Three new playgrounds', '- Indoor/outdoor demo kitchen with bar', '- Bike storage', '- Powered by Alfred (resident tech platform)', '- Renovated clubhouse with flat-screen TVs, lounge, and Wi-Fi', '- Fitness center', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday: 10:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday: 11:00AM-5:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'We are a pet friendly community!', 'We welcome both cats and dogs, with a maximum of two pets per household.', 'For dogs, we do also have breed restrictions of Pit Bull Terriers/Staffordshire Terriers, Rottweilers, Doberman Pinschers, Chows, Presa Canarios, Akitas, Alaskan Malamutes, and Wolf-Hybrids, and a maximum weight limit of 75lbs.', 'We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.', 'ckpaHMy7mOli']
